mapper.select:
SELECT wsi.id, wsi.house_code houseCode, wdi.dict_name houseName, wsi.area_code areaCode, wsi.store_code storeCode, wsi.state FROM wms_storehouse_info wsi LEFT JOIN wms_dict_info wdi ON wsi.house_code = wdi.dict_code
${ew.sqlSegment}

SELECT wsi.id, wsi.area_code areaCode, wsi.house_code houseCode, wsi.store_code storeCode, wsi.state FROM wms_storehouse_info wsi LEFT JOIN wms_storehouse_config wsc ON wsc.storehouse_id = wsi.id LEFT JOIN wms_customer_base_info wcbi ON wcbi.id = wsc.customer_id
${ew.sqlSegment}

select wsc.id, wsi.store_code storeCode, wsi.house_code houseCode, wsi.area_code areaCode from wms_storehouse_config wsc left join wms_customer_base_info wcbi on wcbi.id = wsc.customer_id left join wms_storehouse_info wsi on wsc.storehouse_id = wsi.id left join wms_commodity_info wci on wsc.commodity_id = wci.id ${ew.sqlSegment}

select area_code from wms_storehouse_config sc left join wms_storehouse_info si on sc.storehouse_id = si.id and si.state='1' where sc.customer_id = #{customerId} and sc.state='1' GROUP BY si.area_code
